title: Fox and Rabbit's Garden
description: A very weary and hungry fox happens upon a little rabbit tending his vegetable garden. The kind little rabbit invites the hungry fox to stay for supper, and invitation he eagerly accepts. All the while, Fox dreams of having rabbit stew for his supper. As Fox helps prepare all the vegetables he has gathered, a scrumptious aroma fills the air! “But how can this be without adding hare?!”
author: Laurel Heger
